titles.title: Scientific EXPERT Act of 2025
Scientific EXPERT Act of 2025
Scientific External Process for Educated Review of Therapeutics Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to establish a process for science-focused drug development meetings led by the Reagan-Udall Foundation for the Food and Drug Administration with respect to drugs for rare diseases and conditions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
